content.question: Which of the following is closest to the value of the absolute entropy of <math alttext="H C l gas" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>HCl</mtext> <mo>(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="170 joules per mole Kelvin" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>170 J</mtext> <mtext> /</mtext> <mo>(</mo> <mtext>mol</mtext> <mo>⋅</mo> <mtext>K)</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>
<math alttext="190 joules per mole kelvin" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>190 J</mtext> <mo>/</mo> <mo>(</mo> <mtext>mol</mtext> <mo>⋅</mo> <mtext>K)</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>
<math alttext="350 joules per mole kelvin" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>350 J</mtext> <mo>/</mo> <mo>(</mo> <mtext>mol</mtext> <mo>⋅</mo> <mtext>K)</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="370 joules per mole kelvin" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>370 J</mtext> <mo>/</mo> <mo>(</mo> <mtext>mol</mtext> <mo>⋅</mo> <mtext>K</mtext> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="190 joules per mole kelvin" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>190 J</mtext> <mo>/</mo> <mo>(</mo> <mtext>mol</mtext> <mo>⋅</mo> <mtext>K)</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
